name: Exterminate Zombies: Get Paid
description:
Exterminate zombies in style with up to 4 players in this action packed co-op top-down shooter. Fight unique and challenging zombies with special skills as you progress through endless waves of zombies.

Reach new heights as you try to top the leaderboards and secure a global ranking.


Defeat zombies to unlock new guns and melee weapons. Upgrade your weapons as you complete levels. Flamethrowers, fireworks launchers, drum shotguns, baseball bats, you name it, we got it!


Choose from four characters that each have unique roles to play.

THE MEDIC

Carries a molotov and a health pack. Here to help you back up when you fall.

THE ASSAULT

Proficient with any gun. Carries an explosive grenade and a sentry gun. There is no defence, only offence.

THE RUNNER

Knows how to swing a bat. Carries a teddy bear with a distracting radio and a syringe for extra adrenaline.

THE TANK

Can take quite a few hits. Carries a stun grenade and a sling full of high calibre ammo.
